title: Maja Blanca Maiz (Corn Pudding)
method: Step 1: Mix thoroughly the coconut milk, cream-style corn, rice flour, and sugar in a non-stick pot over medium heat. Stir frequently while cooking until thick, about 30 minutes. Pour into a serving platter with ridges, or a tray, and let cool completely before serving.
Step 2: Garnish your Maja Blanca Maiz withLatik(Fried Coconut Milk Curd) for an authentic Filipino treat.
